Text: Thanks for the credit.  Since i made the file (from the BBC website) i appreciate it.  Im a complete audio book / radio play "junkie" so im always happy to help other "junkies" with litsening material.

Thanks to Spalli, these are going to be great I'm sure. I Have the entire series of Journey Into Space and I'm a big OTR fan. Thanks a million. 

Please seed everyone, I'm suck on 76% for the past 2 days tho heh

Also anyone who has "Dan Dare", basically I'm a new fan of CHARLES CHILTON, and want anything he's written for radio that's sci fi related. But I can't find anything online to download.

Thanks, great stuff.  This completes my mobile entertainment collection for my Cowon curve.  16 g.
of, 'who cares how long I have to wait'. Took my mother to her doctor today and was upset when it didn't take long enough to finish my story.
Thanks for sharing. I'm looking forward to hearing these. :)
